attributes.action: To Allow Boris Johnson to prorogue Parliament .
attributes.additional_details:
Allow Boris Johnson to carry out his duties as Prime minister to deliver Brexit without interference from anti democratic MP's .
So there is no doubt we voted LEAVE
attributes.background:
To Allow Boris Johnson to prorogue Parliament . Also allow Boris Johnson to carry out his duties as Prime minister and to instruct 
Parliament they must deliver on Brexit as it has already been been sufficiently extended and needs to be completed .
